title: REPORT: New WR Coach Noah Pauley to be Hired by Packers

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: REPORT: New WR Coach Noah Pauley to be Hired by Packers
sources.description: It appears one of Matt Campbell’s most promising assistants will be departing Penn State before coaching his first game with the Nittany Lions. Wide receivers coach Noah Pauley is reportedly being hired to join the Green Bay Packers, according to Matt Zenitz of CBS Sports. Pauley was regarded as a rising star in the coaching […]
